story:
Legends of XARLEMYN

This a story for all generations of Star Wars fans and all parents of children who love Superheroes, but want less screen time and less bombastic violence for their young kids. Reading "Legends of XARLEMYN" will give you all of those feels, but without the video screen time and gunfire . . .

That is why I made for my own 4-yr old, PLUS it has the myth-making and storytelling chops that will engross and captivate adult readers as well!

PLOT SUMMARY

The seven worlds of the Xarlswyn star-system are at war. Each world has gathered the strongest Paladyns to make sure they are prosperous and safe. We follow the adventures of these Paladyns on all sides of the conflict as they encounter magic, monsters, wizards, castles and spaceships -- in beautiful full color artwork-- with an evocative text that can be read in multiple languages.

Preview our multi-lingual "look-book" at this link:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1H-tuM_CU9evLs_...

These are stories of bravery and betrayal in a far-away universe where men can act like heroes or fools, where women can be good guys or the villians. It is a world where people of all colors and physical types contribute to the story because of who they are and the choices they make -- just like real life! 

WHO IS TOM MALONE? WHAT IS SPECIAL HERE?

  • I am a community focused teacher/musician/creator & 1st time comic book author
  • This multi-language book will be readable in English, Haitian Creole, Spanish, & Swahili
  • This book will engage readers of all types and cultural backgrounds, especially kids
  • Quality works of Fantasy & Mythology let children experience and rehearse life lessons through imagination

Interested? Well, you can look over the to scripts of the first two issues, view some concept art, and get a feeling what the world of XARLEMYN is all about. Links below:

GET EXCITED - GET SOME FUN PERKS!

Here's how the funding (and perks!) for this campaign will work:

  • The artist's cost for each issue are around $450 a page, so our goal is $8,000.
  • You have many levels to give at and show your support. We also have some cool perks!
  • You can show your support for this project in big or small ways ... it's up to you!
    • $25 you get a copy of "Legends of XARLEMYN" #1 -- made possible by you!
    • $75 you get two signed copies - one to read and one to give away . . .  : ))
    • $100 you get two signed copies - PLUS a T-Shirt with "Be A Legend" and orig ART
    • $100 you get two signed copies - PLUS a bonus vintage small-press indie comic '86-'96
    • $250 you get two signed copies - PLUS a signed photo of NEW KIDS on the BLOCK
    • $350 you get two signed copies - PLUS a signed photo of TOAD the WET SPROCKET
    • $450 you get two signed copies - PLUS a poster signed by BLACK SABBATH (1994)
    • $500 you get two signed copies - PLUS a poster signed by EASTMAN and LAIRD
    • $750 you get two signed copies  + TMNT graphic novel signed by EASTMAN and LAIRD
    • $1000 you get two signed copies + a page of original XARLEMYN art by ______________
    • "$2000 mega-fund-it!"  Two signed copies + a copy of "CYBERFROG Hall of Heroes #1"
    • "$2000 mega-fund-it!"  Two signed copies + a copy of "CYBERFROG Hall of Heroes #2"

I'm excited! How far could this go?

This is a DIY-comics startup campaign -- picture it like a tech startup -- we can bring this vision to life and put it in the hands of kids.  Once that is done, a larger publisher may want to scoop us up and add this title to their roster - bringing it worldwide. 

But, the first step is showing a great product through our combined grassroots efforts.

  • Your donations will result in a beautiful and captivating book for kids of all ages
  • Stretch goals for  include printings in Hindi, Tigre, Farsi, and Cape Verdean Portuguese
  • Each additional $8,000 we raise, funds another issue in the 12 issue saga. Can we hit 96k and publish the whole series? Who knows... anything is possible.... : ))
  • This book is designed to connect parents and children through reading and imagination

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cannot contribute, you can help us by sharing or re-tweeting our Indie-Go-Go link to people in your life --especially geeks sci-fi fans and people with kids who want good imaginative content without the extra violence and screen time.

READING and IMAGINING is exactly what comics teach!!!

Email me at professortea33(at)gmail . .com for preview copies of the scripts for issues 1 and 2 and to answer any questions. Let's build a world together!!

Risks & Challenges?

Of course there are risks. Crowd-funded comics are a wild frontier, and (believe it or not) some people on the internet can troll and flame-war good-intentioned projects and their backers with aggressive political vitriol and agendas. BUT - this is not a political comic. It is a work of fun and fantasy and it is about a sense of wonder. Political aggression and forceful agendas from any side will not be tolerated in this campaign. This is a COMIC for ALL Readers and hate in any form has no home here.

Please back XARLEMYN and "Be A Legend" - Inspire a Child! 

Tom Malone

story:
Short Summary

True Believers of Comics and Entertainment, that's who we are seeking!

In a nutshell, The Prologue Genysus, is about ancient gods and goddesses and similar to Conan, Tarzan, and The Last of the Mohicans, as well as Predator, Alien, and Battlefield Earth movies we all enjoyed. Albeit, very different to be sure.

I am seeking your assistance to get this graphic novel funded, printed, published, and to get it to as many comic book loving people as possible. With your generosity and support, I know this dream project will come to life.

It has been a dream of mine for years, since I was in the military, and now, I am happy to say that it is the dream of my two young children, Mimi and Ibby, as well. With your necessary help, we will get this project completed and fans (there are quite a few already - KOLMEC and VAMPEER have been all over the internet for years), will enjoy it for sure.

What We Need & What You Get

The initial goal is $10,000 which will cover printing, shipping, marketing materials, and pay a digital colorist to color two of the Books (50-pages).

I plan to have a multitude of perks after the initial goal has been immortalized! Please check back on here for updates but one thing is for sure: Each time the initial goal is doubled, there will be a new perk for EVERYONE to enjoy that supports and makes this project come to life.

AND, IF the initial goal is tripled or exceeds $30,000 iAMKomics will fly TWO, of YOU (instead of only one) to the beautiful Wyndham Resort here in Clearwater Beach, Florida. I can assure you, it is an amazing time to spend at least one night at this luxurious resort. My kids and I stayed here before and we loved it!

The Impact

I am a long time comic book Believer and Creator - my kids are now too:-) 

Risks & Challenges

This is my first graphic novel and while it may seem like a huge task, it really is a challenge I am looking forward to completing. I have hundreds of drawings and if 'push comes to shove', I can always fill several books with sketches. Haha! Not gonna happen. I will complete this graphic novel or I will give you your money back. As an artist, I am growing and getting better every time I pick up a pencil or a dip pen to ink with. 

Additionally, when I am given a deadline, as a former military SpecOps warrior, I get it done! This will not be any different. It is why I have given myself until May 2019 to complete it - I do have a day job as a civilian contractor working overseas and I am deployed for up to 8 weeks at a time.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you  don't have the cash to buy a book, you can help fund this awesome project by sharing via social media - it's free. I and my small AGL Studio staff (Mimi and Ibby) will greatly appreciated:-)

Please help us get the word out and share this Indiegogo campaign with all your KOOL friends!

Thank you all for your support!

story:
Greetings Everyone!

  My name is Brady, and I've been working for the last ten years to bring to life an epic horror series that, in my hopes, will revitalize the werewolf-horror subgenre. I've written three novels, The Book of Gray, The Book of Gray: To Live and Die, and The Book of Gray: Of Sand and Ash. With the help of my good friends over at Studio Ronin, I wish to translate this action-horror franchise into beautifully mastered Graphic Novels that everyone can enjoy!

  I've been an artist and a writer all my life, with a large collection of passion projects that I've been dying to get off the ground. You can see my work over at www.bradygoldsmith.com, or, www.thebookofgray.com. There, you will find everything that I've done, including the extensive art that I have produced in regards to The Book of Gray, as well as the art that Studio Ronin has already begun producing.

  You may be asking, $50,000.00 seems like an awful lot for a Graphic Novel? You're right, but let's look at why, because it's an extremely valid question. Studio Ronin is one of the industry leaders in traditional Graphic Novel art, meaning, everything that is done is hand painted and then mastered digitally. Personally, the style that they offer is a perfect fit for a horror Graphic Novel such as this, and they're the only one's I want behind the brush.

  Studio Ronin, and that of Christopher Shy, were responsible for the epic Dead Space Graphic Novel, based on the EA Video Game, as well as the popular Graphic Novels I Sleep in Stone and Man of Leaves. You may also recognize their work from the iconic album cover for Coheed and Cambria, Good Apollo Vol 1. Christopher of Studio Ronin is THE artist on The Book of Gray.

  50k, at minimum, will fund the project to completion. What does that mean? A 220-250 page full color Graphic Novel. Yes, that is correct, 220-250 pages. This isn't a comic book, but a full length Graphic Novel, and I can promise that it will be filled with the following:

1. An extremely realistic approach to the genre
2. A dark atmosphere
3. Dead things
4. Bloody werewolf transformations
5. Brutal werewolf on werewolf action
6. Immersive plot and characters

  Back to the point! 50k will allow me to pay my artist in full to complete The Book of Gray. Any additional funds will help boost our ability to print and produce, ship product, and further dive into the second Graphic Novel, The Book of Gray: To Live and Die. (Which we really, REALLY want to get to because it takes place in WW2) 

  It is my goal to make The Book of Gray Graphic Novel something memorable, something iconic, something dark and gritty and real- but most of all, something that will give horror fans exactly what they've been wanting to see from a killer werewolf saga.


Short Summary about The Book of Gray

  You can find everything about The Book of Gray, and it's sequels, on my website listed above. But, here's a short story synopsis of The Book of Gray, which will be the focal point of Graphic Novel!

  "Skonar Gray, a young boy from Romania (1831), finds himself in a world of darkness and mystery. Amidst the innocence of first love and the hope of a better life, the decadent layers of his existence start to unravel around him. Creatures prowl the forests around his home and his family hides a dangerous secret. Segregated and alone, Skonar will soon come to find that the secret lurking within the walls of his home is unescapable.

  What causes the maddening pains, the nightmares, and the dead to come beckoning? What is the reason behind the horrors of his father’s demands and his brother’s violence, the blood, and the changing coming from within? Only words from a book, written ages ago and lost within the depths can help Skonar to understand who and what he really is. But most of all, how he can change who he is to become in order to face a condemned world.

  The past, the present, and the future, will collide as Skonar embarks on a journey that will change everything.”


What we need and what you get

  We're going to keep it simple. The absolute minimum we need to create this Graphic Novel with Studio Ronin is 50k. All of the money received from this fundraising campaign will go directly to funding the artist, Christopher Shy, printing, and shipping. Every last penny of this campaign is going to the creation of this Graphic Novel. Please note, this is an ALL OR NOTHING campaign. We cannot do this without the support of all of you! If we make our goal, then we are eternally indebted to you for your contributions, and will send you cool stuff, as well as include your name as a special thank you in the final Graphic Novel! Anything above and beyond our goal will only make our job easier, get everything printed, and, also help us dive right into The Book of Gray: To Live and Die. If we do NOT make our goal, all donations will be refunded back to you.

  What do you get?

  One thing we will guarantee is that each and every person responsible for helping this Graphic Novel come to be will be thanked by name. But, we do have some exciting perks, such as signed prints and posters. We honestly don't have a lot to work with, but we want to make sure that all of you are apart of this project and forever recognized for it. This entire thing is in your hands. In the end, we're hoping that it isn't just about a Graphic Novel, but a following, in support of something truly great.


The Impact

Every little bit helps. Our entire goal depends on your support! No pressure!


Risks & Challenges

 The team that we have is limited, which is why we need your help! As long as we can get the funding, we can easily produce our first Graphic Novel within 9-12 months. That will be the general turn around for completion. Studio Ronin, and that of Christopher Shy, works by hand with a paint brush doing what he does best. Each and every panel, page, and spread of this Graphic Novel will be a piece of art- which is the quality that we're looking for. Detail, story, and quality, is everything! We're already underway with getting The Book of Gray up and running, we just need your help to see it through to the end. Please, and thank you!

Other Ways You Can Help

 If you can't contribute, please help us spread the word so we can get this project recognized! Our goal is to create a horror saga that will truly redefine the entire werewolf subgenre. Let's do that together!

story:
In September 2019, a small publishing house created a Kickstarter to get Issue 1 of a new all-ages sci-fi magazine made. Now 6 months later and 3 issues released, they are back and asking you once again to help support this adventure this time via Indiegogo

Over the last 6 months, we have worked with some amazing creators to bring you 3 action-packed, educational and damn right cool science fiction comics the form of The Spark Magazine. www.thesparkmag.co.uk

If you pledge today you will be able to not only pre-order Issue 4 (coming September 2020) we will ALSO ship out Issues 1 - 3, just in case you missed out on previous adventures. All of this straight to your door.

But not only that you can also pledge to get issues 5 - 8 as well when they are released. Wow!

If you need any more enticement into backing this project then we suggest reading down below where we take you through some past stories and also click the image below and read the whole of Issue 1 for FREE. Yes FREE.

story:
I 'm Jonathan Pedroza and I am a fan of collectible action figures . I always wanted to develop a business in creating action figures with professional quality, but with an affordable price, plus you can create any shape you want.  I think there should be a company that creates action figures with any possible shape you want by request.

 In the market there are a couple of companies that create a "yourself figure" and to be honest their product quality is quite poor. But there´s one that have pretty good quality, but it is based on JAPAN.
http://www.dannychoo.com/en/post/26119/Human+Cloning+in+Japan.html
The idea is to create a company to compete in that market, but that also offers creating any possible shape, character or accesorie that you need. Even displays in a future.


As a collector i had the idea to satisfy people who want a character figure that was never released on the market, or a special suit for an actual figure. 
For a moment i tought that this kind of company was impossible... but then i discover "CROWFUNDING".This kind of company is made by Collectors for Collectors, that it´s a big difference between the nearly decadence of the new toys release because of the mass production.

Plastic Molding Process



Wit the earned money, we are going to start a plastic molding company dedicated to the elaboration of HD action figures for request of the people and in a lower cost than ordinary.

We all have that character that we love, but we would LOVE to have or just can´t find a good quiality figure of it. But with MoldBOX we can creat that figure and give the costumer the opportunity to create any figure they want on plastic.
We are planning to start a history character line figures to make our product educational and recreative at the time.

Action Figures Quality?

We can create a high definition with todays 3d printers, and this is cheaper than any on the market. Go and check this LINK information about microns and check the definition. We are going to print the figures up to 280 microns

We are going to select a 5 pack of characters with the concern of all of the investors, but please check our offers. If at the end of the figure selection you are not okay with the choices, you have the option to select the 100$ and we are going to create a special one for you.

WHY CROWFUNDING?

Because i discover this way of funding and i think this is a more efficient way to know the people needs and comments. This is the objective of Indiegogo and this is the new goal for MoldBOX, please help us to make this true.
The other companies need to create thousand of characters so they can afford they spents, but we are planning to satisfy that with a big web of shiping in a future.
By having our own machines to start molding plastic,  we are going to START INMEDIATELY our company.

If we don´t get the goal?

Anyway we have the acces to cheaper production machines here on México, so the production costs reducts a lot. All of your investments are going to be sended.


In a future...


We love the action figure posing displays and accesories, so another goal of the company is to recieve projects from the people and create their displays, accesories and anything that they want.

story:
*I must notify that this Comic project contains graphic violence and gore because of the nature of the story and some of the characters who are inspired by our real world*
 

What is Znahar series?! What are Thanatos and Hypnos?!

Znahar series is a full detailed Comic about a supernatural world beyond our reach or understanding. Thanatos and Hypnos are parts of the series. Each part has a separate and a different story. Thanatos is the prequel of Hypnos.

Hypnos Synopsis; Rodion was a convict. A serial killer with a death sentence. It seemed his fate had been already settled until he got a second chance to redeem his life and regain his freedom.

He was obligated to participate in a secret experimental program called "S.I.M.U.L.A.T.O.R". A virtual reality supported by advanced AI designed to analyze and solve murder crimes. Throughout immersing in it, Rodion is supposed to encounter several murder cases which were committed by the most devious sadists in the history of mankind; Jack the Ripper, H.H.holmes … etc.. But things are much more complicated than they seem.

After some time, Rodion realizes that participation in "S.I.M.U.L.A.T.O.R" also has a price when he starts to experience amnesia and personality disturbances. However, even that is not his biggest problem, especially when he witnessed the AI concept of murder changes to not solve crimes but for studying the murder itself.

Rodion discovers later that not everything he faces in the simulator is imagination, and the serial killers who are simulated by the artificial intelligence are more than just virtual projections or forgotten memories!

Sample pages of Hypnos:​

Still, yet Hypnos and Thanatos have two separate stories, we must notify that the origin of The "S.I.M.U.L.A.T.O.R" was created in Thanatos, and Hypnos’ story depends on many facts that will be discussed in Thanatos.

A small overview of Thanatos; A grieving father, Isaac, finds out that his daughter died in a mysterious accident, has been brought back to life with a different name, Identity, and memory. He starts searching for answers to ultimately discover an illegal experimental program that mentions him as the first patient.

You can check the episodes released of Thanatos on webtoon.

Sample pages of Thanatos:

 

Who are we?

My name is Ahmed Essam aka Cody Ludwig, I am the writer of Znahar series, and of course, this lovely project is drawn by Nela Vohenskaya.

This is not my first novel, before I wrote an Arabic novel (المفكرة السوداء) which can be translated into “Black Note”

This cover is made by the great designer, Ashraf (ash-3xpired)

Also, I work as a writer in collaboration with other great artists and writers in a small beginner amateur studio; Panda House Studios and I am the writer of the first part of Tears Of Winter comic (with alias name; Vincent Valentine) in collaboration with Lucy Isidro.

For Nela Vohenska, she is a self-taught comic artist and traditional painter. She has worked on short indie horror projects with individual clients so far. she has been working on the first series of Znahar: Thanatos since the beginning. Currently, she works on satirical illustrations for NBA's blog called "Quick Fast Release".

Why Indiegogo?

To be honest, we never planned to go over to Indiegogo or any crowdfunding site, as we are not so popular yet, but that was the only choice left when we found that we will never be able to release Znahar without help, that led us to here, to you our amazing fans of comics and supporters of independent creators.

We need your help, as, without your support, this project will never see the light of day and will end up as forgotten words in several Word Documents.

Challenges and risks especially after the campaign

We are familiar with the horrible delays from some creators who couldn’t uphold their promises to you. This does cause some mistrust in the world of independent creation of comics and other industries, that is why we are very careful in the selection of our Perks and in our promises.

Our first issue of Hypnos comic and its rewards of artwork and posters will be digital and they all will be delivered in December or hopefully earlier.

we would like you to know that we will use your funds to pay for the expenses of the making of the comic, you will help us hire more members to make the delivery date sooner than expected.

Other ways you can help: (free copies will be the reward)

Usually most of the creators ask for help by sharing the Indiegogo campaign with your friends and family if you can’t support financially, but still, there is a way to earn your copy of the first issue of Hypnos. Share this Indiegogo with your friends and family and if two copies are sold to your friends or family, you can get your free copy of the first issue of Hypnos (can only be claimed once). All you have to do is ask those of your friends or family who contributed to notify us with your name and Email and we will write your name on a word document ensuring that you will get your copy after confirming the purchase at the end of the campaign.

Please share this with everyone you know. Thank you for your consideration and God bless.

For any questions, you can contact us through our email; Blacktearssouleater@gmail.com

Also, you can follow me on twitter or facebook.

and you can follow Nela on Twitter.

https://www.instagram.com/weepingangellostcanvas/

What is Znahar series?! What are Thanatos and Hypnos?!
Znahar series is a full detailed Comic about a supernatural world beyond our reach or understanding. Thanatos and Hypnos are parts of the series. Each part has a separate and a different story. Thanatos is the prequel of Hypnos.

Hypnos Synopsis; Rodion was a convict. A serial killer with a death sentence. It seemed his fate had been already settled until he got a second chance to redeem his life and regain his freedom.
He was obligated to participate in a secret experimental program called "S.I.M.U.L.A.T.O.R". A virtual reality supported by advanced AI designed to analyze and solve murder crimes. Throughout immersing in it, Rodion is supposed to encounter several murder cases which were committed by the most devious sadists in the history of mankind; Jack the Ripper, H.H.holmes … etc.. But things are much more complicated than they seem.
After some time, Rodion realizes that participation in "S.I.M.U.L.A.T.O.R" also has a price when he starts to experience amnesia and personality disturbances. However, even that is not his biggest problem, especially when he witnessed the AI concept of murder changes to not solve crimes but for studying the murder itself.
Rodion discovers later that not everything he faces in the simulator is imagination, and the serial killers who are simulated by the artificial intelligence are more than just virtual projections or forgotten memories!

Still, yet Hypnos and Thanatos have two separate stories, we must notify that the origin of The "S.I.M.U.L.A.T.O.R" was created in Thanatos, and Hypnos’ story depends on many facts that will be discussed in Thanatos.
A small overview of Thanatos; A grieving father, Isaac, finds out that his daughter died in a mysterious accident, has been brought back to life with a different name, Identity, and memory. He starts searching for answers to ultimately discover an illegal experimental program that mentions him as the first patient.
You can check the episodes released of Thanatos on webtoon.

Who are we?
My name is Ahmed Essam aka Cody Ludwig, I am the writer of Znahar series, and of course, this lovely project is drawn by Nela Vohenskaya.
This is not my first novel, before I wrote an Arabic novel (المفكرة السوداء) which can be translated into “Black Note”

This cover is made by the great designer, Ashraf (ash-3xpired)
Also, I work as a writer in collaboration with other great artists and writers in a small beginner amateur studio; Panda House Studios and I am the writer of the first part of Tears Of Winter comic (with alias name; Vincent Valentine) in collaboration with Lucy Isidro.
For Nela Vohenska, she is a self-taught comic artist and traditional painter. She has worked on short indie horror projects with individual clients so far. she has been working on the first series of Znahar: Thanatos since the beginning. Currently, she works on satirical illustrations for NBA's blog called "Quick Fast Release".

Why Indiegogo?
To be honest, we never planned to go over to Indiegogo or any crowdfunding site, as we are not so popular yet, but that was the only choice left when we found that we will never be able to release Znahar without help, that led us to here, to you our amazing fans of comics and supporters of independent creators.
We need your help, as, without your support, this project will never see the light of day and will end up as forgotten words in several Word Documents.

Challenges and risks especially after the campaign
We are familiar with the horrible delays from some creators who couldn’t uphold their promises to you. This does cause some mistrust in the world of independent creation of comics and other industries, that is why we are very careful in the selection of our Perks and in our promises.
Our first issue of Hypnos comic and its rewards of artwork and posters will be digital and they all will be delivered in December or hopefully earlier.
we would like you to know that we will use your funds to pay for the expenses of the making of the comic, you will help us hire more members to make the delivery date sooner than expected.
Other ways you can help: (free copies will be the reward)
Usually most of the creators ask for help by sharing the Indiegogo campaign with your friends and family if you can’t support financially, but still, there is a way to earn your copy of the first issue of Hypnos. Share this Indiegogo with your friends and family and if two copies are sold to your friends or family, you can get your free copy of the first issue of Hypnos (can only be claimed once). All you have to do is ask those of your friends or family who contributed to notify us with your name and Email and we will write your name on a word document ensuring that you will get your copy after confirming the purchase at the end of the campaign.
Please share this with everyone you know. Thank you for your consideration and God bless.
